screens.name: Login
screens.description: The login screen allows users to authenticate with their credentials.

screens.name: Dashboard
screens.description: The main dashboard showing an overview of audits and tasks.

screens.name: AuditList
screens.description: List of all audits with filtering and sorting options.

screens.name: AuditForm
screens.description: The audit form screen where users can fill out audit questionnaires.

screens.name: AuditReport
screens.description: Detailed audit report with findings and recommendations.

screens.name: ReportSummary
screens.description: Summary of audit reports with key metrics and scores.
